title: 1C Combined - All Errors (Event Log + Tech Log)

list.name: infobase
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT infobase_name FROM logs.event_log WHERE infobase_name != '' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT infobase_name FROM logs.tech_log WHERE infobase_name != '' ORDER BY infobase_name

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(error_count) AS total_errors
FROM (
  SELECT count() AS error_count
  FROM logs.event_log
  WHERE event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
    AND level = 'Error'
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Event Log' IN ($source))
  UNION ALL
  SELECT count() AS error_count
  FROM logs.tech_log
  WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
    AND name IN ('EXCP', 'ERR', 'EXCPTXT')
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Tech Log' IN ($source))
)

SELECT count() AS error_count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE event_time >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
  AND level = 'Error'
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))

SELECT count() AS error_count
FROM logs.tech_log
WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR
  AND name IN ('EXCP', 'ERR', 'EXCPTXT')
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))

SELECT
  toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 300) * 300) AS time,
  'Event Log' AS source,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND level = 'Error'
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Event Log' IN ($source))
GROUP BY time

UNION ALL

SELECT
  toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 300) * 300) AS time,
  'Tech Log' AS source,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.tech_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND name IN ('EXCP', 'ERR', 'EXCPTXT')
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Tech Log' IN ($source))
GROUP BY time

ORDER BY time

SELECT
  source,
  count
FROM (
  SELECT 'Event Log' AS source, count() AS count
  FROM logs.event_log
  WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
    AND level = 'Error'
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Event Log' IN ($source))
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT 'Tech Log' AS source, count() AS count
  FROM logs.tech_log
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND name IN ('EXCP', 'ERR', 'EXCPTXT')
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Tech Log' IN ($source))
)

SELECT
  infobase_name,
  source,
  count
FROM (
  SELECT infobase_name, 'Event Log' AS source, count() AS count
  FROM logs.event_log
  WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
    AND level = 'Error'
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Event Log' IN ($source))
    AND infobase_name != ''
  GROUP BY infobase_name
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT infobase_name, 'Tech Log' AS source, count() AS count
  FROM logs.tech_log
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND name IN ('EXCP', 'ERR', 'EXCPTXT')
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Tech Log' IN ($source))
    AND infobase_name != ''
  GROUP BY infobase_name
)
ORDER BY infobase_name, source

SELECT
  timestamp AS "Дата, время",
  source AS "Источник",
  infobase_name AS "Информационная база",
  user_name AS "Пользователь",
  metadata AS "Метаданные",
  error_description AS "Описание ошибки",
  computer AS "Компьютер/Сервер"
FROM (
  -- Event Log errors
  SELECT
    event_time AS timestamp,
    'Event Log' AS source,
    infobase_name,
    user_name,
    CASE
      WHEN metadata_presentation != '' THEN metadata_presentation
      ELSE metadata_name
    END AS metadata,
    comment AS error_description,
    computer
  FROM logs.event_log
  WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
    AND level = 'Error'
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Event Log' IN ($source))
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- Tech Log exceptions
  SELECT
    timestamp,
    'Tech Log' AS source,
    infobase_name,
    '' AS user_name,
    metadata_name AS metadata,
    concat(name, ': ', error_description) AS error_description,
    server_computer_name AS computer
  FROM logs.tech_log
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND name IN ('EXCP', 'ERR', 'EXCPTXT')
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Tech Log' IN ($source))
)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 2000

SELECT
  time,
  source,
  count
FROM (
  SELECT
    toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 3600) * 3600) AS time,
    'Event Log' AS source,
    count() AS count
  FROM logs.event_log
  WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
    AND level = 'Error'
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Event Log' IN ($source))
  GROUP BY time
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT
    toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 3600) * 3600) AS time,
    'Tech Log' AS source,
    count() AS count
  FROM logs.tech_log
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND name IN ('EXCP', 'ERR', 'EXCPTXT')
    AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
    AND ('$__all' IN ($source) OR 'Tech Log' IN ($source))
  GROUP BY time
)
ORDER BY time
